t: Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM): Definition and Examples
s: An original equipment manufacturer (OEM) provides components for another company’s product and works closely with the seller of the finished product.

s: OEM means "Original Equipment Manufacturer". I used this part on a GE refrigerator. GE used Samsung as the manufacturer for the ice maker for my refrigerator; therefore, Samsung was the manufacturer of the original equipment that came with the new refrigerator.
